revised_title: Pathologiae Cerebri & Nervosi Generis Specimen: A Study of Convulsive Diseases and Scurvy
tldr: This article provides a detailed study of convulsive diseases and scurvy, focusing on the nervous system and its functions. The author, Thomas Willis, explores the causes, symptoms, and treatments of various convulsive disorders and scurvy, including epilepsy, convulsive fits, and other neurological conditions. He also discusses the role of animal spirits and their impact on the body's movements and functions.
